wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.name: id
wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.description: Required. Must be unique. Used as an id in the HTML for the accordion as a whole, and also as a prefix for the ids of the section contents and the buttons that open them, so that those ids can be the target of aria-labelledby and aria-control attributes.

wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.name: headingText
wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.description: Required. Text content for heading line. If headingHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.name: contentText
wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.description: Required. The text content of each section, which is hidden when the section is closed. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.name: contentHTML
wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.description: Required. The HTML content of each section, which is hidden when the section is closed.

wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.name: isOpen
wmndsJourneyPlannerWidgetProps.description: If true, accordion element will be expanded upon initial load. Defaults to false.
